      • checkANUnlock

        public boolean checkANUnlock(int x)
        Checks if the hero is trying (and can) unlock a door, if so after 1 turn unlocks the door
        Parameters:
        x - hero needs 1 turn to unlock, if x == 0, does nothing, but if x == 1 opens the doors
        Returns:
        True when it unlocks the door
